title: Padma Kundan Studs: The Jewel of Tradition
materials: and Premium Cubic Zirconia (CZ) Diamonds. Featuring a brilliant Hyderabadi Polish for lasting luster.
features: These stunning studs showcase a traditional lotus (padma) motif meticulously crafted in gold. The design features an open setting which highlights the brilliance of coral gemstone and is further embellished with sparkling CZ diamonds around the design. This design has open space, that makes this look both contemporary and classic.
colors: Warm gold with the vibrant red of the coral (pagadam) and the dazzling white of the CZ diamonds.
occasions: Perfect for both casual and festive occasions
add this to your work attire
these studs are great for everyday wear. Also goes very well with festive occasions such as Varamahalakshmi Vratham
or a modern take on traditional Indian attire.
description: These earrings seamlessly blend traditional South Indian craftsmanship with modern design sensibilities. The high-quality gold, radiant coral, and sparkling CZ diamonds make it a treasured piece. The design's nod to tradition ensures this piece will remain a timeless addition to any jewelry collection.
